[docs]def create_parser():
  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Local MathHub tool.')

  subparsers = parser.add_subparsers(help='valid actions are:', dest="action", metavar='action')

  lmhstatus.add_parser(subparsers)

  parser_setup = subparsers.add_parser('setup', help='sets up local math hub and fetches external requirements')
  parser_install = subparsers.add_parser('install', help='fetches a MathHub repository and its dependencies')

  parser_path = subparsers.add_parser('path', help='path management')
  parser_init = subparsers.add_parser('init', help='initialize reposdestitory with MathHub repository structure')
  parser_root = subparsers.add_parser('root', help='prints the root directory of the Local Math Hub repository')
  parser_drain = subparsers.add_parser('drain', help='send changes to mathhub')
  parser_delete = subparsers.add_parser('delete', help='removes a repository from your local installation')
  parser_upgen = subparsers.add_parser('upgen', help='updates generated content')
  parser_depscrawl = subparsers.add_parser('depscrawl', help='crawls current repository for dependencies')

  parser_root = subparsers.add_parser('repos', help='prints the group/repository of the current  Math Hub repository')
  parser_update = subparsers.add_parser('update', help='get repository and tool updates')

  return parser
